author: Gouge, William, 1578-1653.
publisher: Printed by G.M. for Joshua Kirton and Thomas Warren ...,
notes: Attributed to William Gouge by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.

"Herein I. The grounds of the morality of the Sabbath. II. Directions for sanctifying it. III. Proofs that the Lords day is the Christians Sabbath. III. Aberrations about the Sabbath. V. Motives to sanctifie the Sabbath."
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
keywords: Sabbath --  Biblical teaching --  Early works to 1800.
